author: COMSOL
description: This example demonstrates the polarization properties for a Gaussian beam incident at an interface between two media at the Brewster angle. It shows how to use the Electromagnetic Waves, Beam Envelopes interface with a user-defined phase specification. Matched Boundary Condition features are used for absorbing waves incident on boundaries at oblique angles.
label: brewster_interface.mph
name: root
